text:
Will be new to the area and looking for recommendations on apartments/townhomes in Seattle/Bellevue (more towards Bellevue as my employer is in the eastside) area that specifically have either a small storage room or garage area that I can store some weight equipment in.  It doesn't seem a common amenity, so asking here.

I know a lot of higher end apartments (especially in Bellevue area) have gyms as part of the amenities, but I find having my own equipment readily available whenever I want just works better for me.  Prefer to work out alone and in as short a time as possible, so don't like "traveling" to gyms.  My home "gym" really is just free weights, kettlebell, a bench, barbell for deadlifting and snatches, dip bars, and a pullup bar.  I don't need much space to use them, but don't want to store them in my living area.

Also I use sites like Zillow, Hotpads, Apartments.com, but having "garage" as a filter selection isn't common or possible, so seeing if people have some personal recs.

In terms of "vibe", I think I'd do well in like Greenlake/Fremont/Wallingford area, but it'd be too hard of a commute.  Bellevue isn't really my thing with the glitzy strip mall vibe, but I can do it for a year or two.

Critera include:

- 1 bed / 1 bath 
- sq ft. 400-700 
- max rent $1500-$2200ish 
- in unit laundry
- relatively quiet
- I have no pets
- don't care so much about close to bars, but would like walkable to at least some restaurants and grocery.
- don't care about apartment amenities like pool, jacuzzi, grill area, etc.  I would never use it.  The simpler the better.
- garage or storage area big enough to store weights

I would like to have posted this in /r/eastside, but the posts there are restricted to certain users.

Any recs would be appreciated, thanks.
title: Apartment recs with storage rooms or garages for small home gym?
